title: How to View Someoneâ€™s Limited-Time Snap Stories Anonymously

steps.title: Snapchat Online Viewer.
steps.content: Snapchat Online Viewer. This is essentially a search engine providing Snapchat results for the username you enter on the site. You'll only be able to see public information; not Stories that are private. Go to https://megastory.org/snapchat-viewer , enter the Snapchat username and click the magnifier icon.

steps.title: Snapchat Video Downloader.
steps.content: Snapchat Video Downloader. You don't have to download the videos just to watch them. You can find public information, like Stories, from a Snapchat user. Go to https://snap.storyclone.com/ , enter the username, and click Search .

steps.title: Snapchat Story Viewer.
steps.content: Snapchat Story Viewer. You can find public Snapchat Stories in one click. Use this site on either your phone or computer. Go to https://storybox.io/snapchat-story-viewer/ and click Get Started . Enter the username and click Launch Tool to begin.

steps.title: Snaplytics.
steps.content: Snaplytics. This is another Snapchat Stories Viewer so you can view Stories on Snapchat without notifying the other person as long as they have a public profile. Go to https://snaplytics.io/snapchat-story-downloader/ , enter the Snapchat user's username or URL, then click Download . Many of these tools have free unlimited anonymous viewing power, but you'll need to pay to increase the quality of the videos.

steps.title: Snapchat Downloader.
steps.content: Snapchat Downloader. Using this site to view and download Snapchat videos couldn't be easier. With the video downloaded to your mobile device or computer, you can view it anytime, anywhere -- without logging into the Snapchat app! Go to https://schatdownloader.com/ , then paste the URL to the Snapchat video you want to view and download. Then select Download .

steps.title: You can watch videos on Snapchat without notifying the original poster.
steps.content: You can watch videos on Snapchat without notifying the original poster. With these online tools, you don't need to enter your login information. In that case, you aren't logged in, so your activity is 100% anonymous.
